attributes.action: Allow all UK schools to have a LGBT+ support group.
attributes.background: Many schools are uneducated in the LGBT+ community so by introducing a support group to every UK school (especially same sex schools) hopefully discrimination against people within this community will come to an end.

rejection.details: We're not sure what action you'd like the government to take. Schools are already allowed to have LGBT+ support groups. You could start a new petition calling for all schools to be required to have a support group, if that's what you would like to happen, or asking the Government to provide specific resources or funding to support and encourage such groups.
